articles.title: CEO of spyware maker Memento Labs confirms one of its government customers was caught using its malware - TechCrunch
articles.description: Security researchers found a government hacking campaign that relies on Windows spyware developed by surveillance tech maker Memento Labs. When reached by TechCrunch, the spyware maker's chief executive blamed a government customer for getting caught.

articles.title: New World: Aeternum Is Ending New Content After Season 10 - GameSpot
articles.description: Players will still be able to revisit New World: Aeternum for now, but there won't be any more seasons or DLC.

articles.title: Super Mario 3D All-Stars Updated To Version 1.1.4, Improves Gameplay On Switch 2 - Nintendo Life
Gemini coming to Google TV Streamer, more devices this winter - 9to5Google
articles.description: In starting the Gemini for Home assistant preview, Google also shared when Gemini for Google TV is coming to the Google TV Streamer.

articles.title: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game reveals new gameplay footage, Closed Alpha Test announced - EventHubs
